name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael B. HUFFMAN, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael B. HUFFMAN, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Erie County Court of Common Pleas dated September 18, 1998. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the common pleas court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marshall J. Piccinini, Erie, Robert A. Graci, Harrisburg, for the Com.
William J. Hathaway, Erie, for Michael B. Huffman.
casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 733
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Michael B. HUFFMAN, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 9, 1999.
Decided Sept. 8, 1999.
Marshall J. Piccinini, Erie, Robert A. Graci, Harrisburg, for the Com.
William J. Hathaway, Erie, for Michael B. Huffman.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
